official_title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States to present on behalf of Congress a specially struck medal to the widow of Roy Wilkins.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to present, on behalf of the Congress, a specially struck gold medal to the widow of Roy Wilkins. Authorizes the Secretary of the Treasury to coin and sell bronze duplicates of such medal. Authorizes appropriations.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the President of the United States to present on behalf of Congress a specially struck medal to the widow of Roy Wilkins.
